name: Simple Fun #70: Avoid Obstacles
description: # Task You are given an array of integers `arr` that representing coordinates of obstacles situated on a straight line. Assume that you are jumping from the point with coordinate 0 to the right. You are allowed only to make jumps of the same length represented by some integer. Find the minimal length of the jump enough to avoid all the obstacles. # Example For `arr = [5, 3, 6, 7, 9]`, the output should be `4`. Check out the image below for better understanding: # Input/Output - `[input]` integer array `arr` Non-empty array of positive integers. Constraints: `1 ≤ inputArray[i] ≤ 100.` - `[output]` an integer The desired length.
